shortdesc.ph: Configuration of video screenshot and upload.

plentry.pd: 0: (Default) No actual function. Do not set type to this value.
1: Video content moderation. The SDK takes screenshots and inspect videos sent by local users, and uploads the screenshots and moderation results.
2: Video screenshot and upload via Agora self-developed extension. The SDK takes screenshots of videos sent by local users and upload them.

3: Video screenshot and upload via extensions from Agora Extensions Marketplace. SDK uses video moderation extensions from Agora Extensions Marketplace to take screenshots of the video stream in the channel and uploads them.

pd.p: Additional information on the video content (maximum length: 1024 Bytes).

The SDK sends the screenshots and additional information on the video content to the Agora server. Once the video screenshot and upload process is completed, the Agora server sends the additional information and the callback notification to your server.

The SDK sends the screenshots and additional information on the video content to the Agora content moderation server. Once the content moderation process is completed, the Agora content moderation server sends the additional information and the content moderation results to your server.

plentry.pd: (Optional) Server configuration related to uploading video screenshots via extensions from Agora Extensions Marketplace. This parameter only takes effect when type in is set to . If you want to use it, contact .

pd.p: A maximum of 32 instances can be configured, and the value range of MAX_CONTENT_INSPECT_MODULE_COUNT is an integer in [1,32].
pd.note: A function module can only be configured with one instance at most. Currently only the video screenshot and upload function is supported.

plentry.pd: The number of functional modules, that is,the number of configured instances, must be the same as the number of instances configured in modules. The maximum number is 32.
